channel.title: +०१ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +०१ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.description: Eggeling I. 1. Reverence, O Rudra, be to thy wrath; and to thine arrow be reverence; and to both thine arms be reverence! 2. What auspicious form there is of thine, free from terror and boding of evil, with that most propitious form look down upon us, O mountain-dweller! 3. The shaft thou bearest in thy hand to hurl, O mountain-dweller, make it harmless, O protector of mountains, injure not man nor beast!

०१ मूलम् - Weber अ᳘थैनम᳘तः प᳘रिषिश्चति॥ एतद्वा᳘ एनं देवाः᳘ शतरुद्रि᳘येण शमयित्वा᳘थैनमेतद्भू᳘य एॗवाशमयंस्त᳘थैॗवैनमेव᳘मेत᳘छतरुद्रि᳘येण शमयित्वा᳘थैनमेतद्भू᳘य एव᳘ शमयति॥ Eggeling He then sprinkles him (Agni-Rudra, the fire-altar). For the gods, having now appeased him by the Śatarudriya, thereby appeased him still further; and in like manner does this (Sacrificer), now that he has appeased him by the Śatarudriya, still further appease him thereby. ०२ मूलम् - Weber अद्भिः प᳘रिषिञ्चति॥ शा᳘न्तिर्वा आ᳘पः शम᳘यत्येॗवैनमेत᳘त्सर्व᳘तः प᳘रिषिञ्चति सर्व᳘त एॗवैनमेत᳘छमयति त्रिष्कृ᳘त्वः प᳘रिषिञ्चति त्रिवृ᳘दग्निर्या᳘वानग्निर्या᳘वत्यस्य मा᳘त्रा ता᳘वतैॗवैनमेत᳘छमयति॥
